TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An indolent (slow-growing) type of B-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma (cancer of the lymphatic system) in which there are both small and large cancer cells.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "follicular mixed cell lymphoma"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "linfoma folicular de células mixtas"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de linfoma no Hodgkin de células B (cáncer del sistema linfático) que es de crecimiento lento (indolente) y tiene células cancerosas pequeñas y grandes.
